mapper.sql: brand_id, brand_nickname, brand_name, brand_url, brand_logo, brand_prom_index, brand_sort, brand_seo_title, brand_seo_keyword, brand_seo_desc, brand_delflag, brand_create_name, brand_create_time, brand_modified_name, brand_modified_time, brand_del_name, brand_del_time,store_id
mapper.select: select brand.brand_id, brand.brand_nickname, brand.brand_name, brand.brand_url, brand.brand_logo, brand.brand_prom_index, brand.brand_sort, brand.brand_seo_title, brand.brand_seo_keyword, brand.brand_seo_desc, brand.brand_delflag, brand.brand_create_name, brand.brand_create_time, brand.brand_modified_name, brand.brand_modified_time, brand.brand_del_name, brand.brand_del_time from np_goods_brand brand , np_third_grandbrand grandbrand where brand.brand_id = grandbrand.brand_id and grandbrand.del_flag = '0' and grandbrand.third_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and brand.brand_delflag = '0'
mapper.insert: insert into np_goods_brand (brand_id, brand_nickname, brand_name, brand_url, brand_logo, brand_prom_index, brand_sort, brand_seo_title, brand_seo_keyword, brand_seo_desc, brand_delflag, brand_create_name, brand_create_time, brand_modified_name, brand_modified_time, brand_del_name, brand_del_time, brand_desc ) values (#{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{brandNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandPromIndex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{brandSort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brandSeoTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandSeoKeyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandSeoDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandDelflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{brandCreateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{brandModifiedName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandModifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{brandDelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandDelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{brandDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
